ReturnPolicy.Description:
20% restocking fee apply.
Item has to return in the same condition, in original package that was sent. Please note that eBay, PayPal fees are included in the item price. Shipping cost is paid for the buyer or the seller ( included in item price). Shipping cost never is free because USPS does not ship anything for free and does not refund shipping cost even is the item is broken.

Title: Vintage Solid Sterling Silver 925 - USA - Heart Make Up - Compact Case - Vanity
Description: Welcome to LUCYLA STOREItem Description:Vintage Sterling Silver 925 - HEAVY USA - Heart Make Up - Compact CaseThis is a vintage compact case. This elegant compact is solid Sterling silver 925 (marked and tested), made in USA. It is in beautiful vintage condition, the mirror inside has some signals from the age. This weighs about 49.7 grams in my scale, and the measurements approx. 2.30" height by depth 0.51". This opens and closes perfectly, and it is monogrammed.Please see the 12 pictures for details. Other similar items are listed in my store.Add me to your Favorites listITEMS CONDITION: Items are stored in storage, free smoking, free pets, may be surface dust or dirt for time stored. Original boxes may have signal from improper stored. Please review the pictures.The buyer will receive the listed item shown in the pictures.CONTACT (ENGLISH / SPANISH): Feel free to contact me for any question before buying.Buyer's offers, questions, comments and suggestions are welcome. RETURN POLICY: BUYER PAYS Returning SHIPPING COST, and eBay / PayPal fees if them apply. Item exchange or money back ( 20% ) restocking fee apply.DAMAGE: If Item arrives damaged or lost, buyer has to send pictures to support it within 24 Hours after tracking number marks delivery.After the 24 hours, the buyer has to do a claim directly with the carrier.Store's security videos supports the condition, and quantity of the items in the claims. Item used or broken by the buyer does not have return. If item isin a sealed package, return will not be accepted if package is opened.BIDDING / MAKE AN OFFER: Item will be paid within 3 days. An automatic unpaid case will be open by eBay. Please note that the eBay / PayPal fees are included in the item cost. Shipping never is free, it is paid by the buyer or included in the item cost and paid by seller.If shipping cost is included in item price, buyer can use the eBay Shipping Calculator for estimate it before make an offers.FEEDBACK: Positive feedback is left automatically after clear payment. Transaction will be completed once the satisfied costumer leaves a positive feedback and a five star.SHIPPING:It will send the same or 1 business day after clear payment.Tracking number is included.This list does not offer Local pickup (NO EXCEPTION). All items are sent with a prepaid label provided by eBay, never requires any extra fees to be paid by the buyer, if in some instance buyer is charged more than agreed for shipping, then just refuse the item, and the item will be resent with a different label.No discounts will be applied to shipping after the item is delivered. Combine shipping is available.INTERNATIONAL BUYERS: import duties or taxes are not included in item price or shipping cost. Charges are buyer's responsibility. Please check if your country apply additional fees prior buying.
